item.title: ZLATICA
item.description: Meadow spreading down the valley. This is where I first learned to skii.

item.title: POPPY
item.description: When driving around countryside, I spot a steep hill full of poppies and fell in love with the red image.

item.title: ZLATKA
item.description: I finally managed to get some more sample waste materials, and a new patch sweater was made.

item.title: SREBRNA
item.description: Everytime my mom goes for a walk, she says she has to combine comfort with convenience.

item.title: ZALA
item.description: Beginning of the lockdown; I moved back home from Ljubljana.

item.title: ŠPELA
item.description: Very often, when coming amid unknown people and learning someone is from the same area where I live, I feel connected to them by this fact, and I trust them slightly more than the others.

item.title: LOTI
item.description: Besides making one-of-a-kind out of second-hand and waste-textile garments, I love photography.

item.title: ELA
item.description: I love playing with light and shadow, with colour.

item.title: ŠPELA BRINA
item.description: It was one day in October, the sun still shining bright and warm.

item.title: CVETKA
item.description: Cvetka represents a person who accepts the state of being unwanted, the stage of not belonging somewhere or to someone and still seeing through all of it, becoming something more.

item.title: ROZALIJA
item.description: Rozalija, inspired by colorful Salvation Mountain by Leonard Knight in California Desert Area, USA and clothing details and sillhuetes of the 50s, was designed as my 3rd years’ final collection as a student of Textile and fashion design at the Faculty of Natural Science and Engineering under the mentorship of prof.

item.title: MAJA
item.description: Second hand shirts getting a new chance, a new life for a better and greener tomorrow.

item.title: About Morja
item.description: Zala Hrastar I am a 22-year-old fashion graduate, creating under artistic name MORJA.

item.title: Contact me
item.description: For any questions, orders or interests in collaboration, just write to me!
